description: FlowFlex Rapid Antigen Test
title: FlowFlex Rapid Antigen Test

description: This test is required by some countries and some airlines prior to departing from the UK.
footer: We aim to provide results 24 hours after receiving samples at the lab, however, we can not accept responsibility for delays caused by Royal Mail.

points.text: Not suitable for test time windows of 48 hours or less
Fit to travel certificate will be issued once negative results are reported by the laboratory

title: Fit to Travel PCR Test

description: If you are arriving in to the UK and you have not been fully vaccinated* by a UK recognised vaccination programme, you will require a Day 2 Covid-19 PCR test.
footer:
*You are considered fully vaccinated only 14 days after you have completed your vaccination course.

We aim to provide results 24 hours after receiving samples at the lab, however, we can not accept responsibility for delays caused by Royal Mail.

points.text: As per government guidelines, this item is not cancellable under any circumstances
Includes NGS (next generation sequencing) for variant surveillance on day 2)
Certificates will be emailed once results have been processed by the laboratories

title: Day 2 PCR Test
